segments.text: Over there, I notice the boy is precariously balanced on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s really stretching to reach into the cookie jar on the high shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, with its legs splayed out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backwards at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is standing below, looking up with such eagerness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, what clever little rascals, sneaking cookies while their mother is distracted!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't lose his balance and tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be quite a crash, and probably broken dishes too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risk they're taking for a few cookies is quite daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous efforts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool is making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
